I.ii.2.4.d
.
Definition:  Vocational Rehabilitation Under 38 U.S.C. 31
Vocational rehabilitation
under
38 U.S.C. Chapter 31
provides subsistence allowance as well as other services and assistance necessary for an eligible Veteran with compensable SC disabilities to
achieve maximum independence in daily living, and
obtain and maintain suitable employment.
Reference
:  For more information on vocational rehabilitation, see
38 CFR Part 21, Subpart A
, and
M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, 5.A
.
title: M21-1, Part I, Subpart ii, Chapter 2 - Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) Benefit Programs
citation: Part I, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section None
